name: Kingdoms Rise
description: Kingdoms Rise is a multiplayer fantasy game focused on palpable sword combat. Select your choice of weapons and abilities and step into a battlefield where skill alone will decide your fate.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.4 GHz or AMD Athlon X2 2.7 GHz Memory: 1500 MB RAM Graphics: ATI Radeon 3870 or higher, Nvidia GeForce 8800 GT or higher DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection
